heroDescription: A non-profit group helping grow Korea's Ethereum ecosystem.
whoWeAreDescription: <bold>The Ticker is ETH</bold> is a non-profit group founded in 2024, building public goods for Korea's Ethereum ecosystem through research, news curation, and community events.
philosophyBox: Our mission is to gather and spread builders' insights, creating <accent>public goods</accent> for Korea's Ethereum ecosystem. Led by the community, existing for the community, and growing with the community.
publicGoodsDescription: Operated solely through grants and donations, all research and educational materials are freely available. No token, no hidden agenda â€” we exist purely for the value of public goods.
communityDrivenDescription: Anyone can become a contributor, and the community builds it together. We support community-led events and provide open-source resources to create an environment that grows together.
builderEcosystemDescription: We deliver the latest trends and news from Ethereum protocol, L2, and infrastructure builders. We serve as a bridge connecting Korean developers to the global ecosystem.
poeticQuote:
"A public good is not built by one person.
The community builds together, nurtures together, and grows together."

teamPreview.title: The People Behind It
teamPreview.description: Team members and contributors voluntarily building for Korea's Ethereum ecosystem.

community.title: Community Proven
community.octantDescription: Selected for Ethereum's public goods funding program Epoch 9, recognized for community value.
community.daysDescription: Consistently sharing Ethereum ecosystem insights every day since November 2024.
community.githubDescription: All code and research published on GitHub for full transparency.
